RoyalTitleDef.label: commfriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Commerce Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: exchanger
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Commerce Branch, and as such has limited access to its economic tools.

RoyalTitleDef.label: trader
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: financier
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: marketeer
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors of many kinds.

RoyalTitleDef.label: bankroller
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high esteem of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for powerful favors of many kinds.

RoyalTitleDef.label: Oligopolist
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the utmost esteem of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for all manner of powerful favors.
